about.title: I'm Camille Lavenant,
about.subtitle: Web developper in Rennes
about.1: After obtaining a research master's degree in Chinese in 2020, I am currently undergoing professional retraining.
about.2: Following training in web development, I am now looking for an internship in a company with a first job.
about.3: I am comfortable with HTML, CSS, but also JavaScript, Node.js and React.
about.4: Do not hesitate to contact me.
